posts.content: G'day everyone! An ozzie guy here with a 58 semaphore in my garage about to restore it. Doing a Vehicle restoration course at TAFE (technical college) but I still pine for my '67 split camper walkthrough that I sold to get my ticket back to Australia. She had the rego WMA334E i think, or maybe WMA344E. How is she going? Love to see a pic?

After searching our DVLA (Driver and Vehicle Licensing Agency) records:

Looks like its been off the road for 8 years

WMA344E

✗ Untaxed
Tax due: 01 August 2007
✗ No MOT
Expired: 20 July 2007


Vehicle make VOLKSWAGEN
Date of first registration 15 May 1967
Year of manufacture 1967
Cylinder capacity (cc) 1493cc
CO₂Emissions Not available
Fuel type PETROL
Vehicle status Not taxed
Vehicle colour GREEN
Vehicle type approval Not available
Wheelplan 2 AXLE RIGID BODY
Revenue weight Not available

Anybody have her stashed away somewhere?
